TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XPathMessageContextTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Provides a way to convert an to a format that can be serialized as XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> cannot be serialized as XAML. To solve this problem, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextTypeConverter> to convert an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> class to an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextMarkupExtension>.
